qas.question: Which colors are part of the RGB model?
What color light is created when one mixes red, green, and blue?
The RGB color model has three colors in it that are described as what kind of colors?
Which era did Cennino Cennini actively paint in?
What colors are used to create purple on a computer screen?
What colors are in the RBG model?
What color did Cennini Cennino make?
When did Cennini Cennino make violet?

context: In modern color theory, also known as the RGB color model, <a0_0><b5_0><b6_0>red, green and blue<b6_0/><b5_0/><a0_0/> are <a2_0>additive primary colors<a2_0/>. Red, green and blue light combined together makes <a1_0>white<a1_0/> light, and these three colors, combined in different mixtures, can produce nearly any other color. This is the principle that is used to make all of the colors on your computer screen and your television. For example, purple on a computer screen is made by a similar formula to used by Cennino Cennini in <a3_0>the <b8_0>Renaissance<b8_0/><a3_0/> to make <b7_0>violet<b7_0/>, but using additive colors and light instead of pigment: it is created by combining <a4_0>red and blue<a4_0/> light at equal intensity on a black screen. Violet is made on a computer screen in a similar way, but with a greater amount of blue light and less red light.
